channel.title: I need help running mopar
channel.description:
When i try to run "runMoparscape" it comes up with
'java' is not recognised as an external command, operable program or hatch file. Press any key to continue...
What do i do, please help. :([br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2007, 03:37:24 PM[/size][hr]can sombody please help me i wanna play mopar :P
